description: This file defines a client-side storage class 'Store' for managing 'todo' items, including methods for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and dropping data, and exports it to the global window object.

classes.name: Store
classes.description: A constructor function for managing a collection of todo items in client-side storage, with methods for CRUD operations.

methods.name: Store
methods.description: Constructor for creating a new storage instance with a specified name, initializing storage if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds todo items matching a query object.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all todo items from storage.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves or updates a todo item in storage, generating a new ID if necessary.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a todo item by ID.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Clears all todo data from storage.
